Title: The Lost City of Z: Percy Fawcett's Obsession
Description: Journey into the heart of the Amazon with explorer Percy Fawcett and his quest for the Lost City of Z. This short video explores the mystery surrounding one of history's most tantalizing tales of exploration. #HistoricalMysteries #LostCityOfZ #PercyFawcett #AmazonMysteries
